get.summary: Returns networks supported by the API

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Title of the network to search for

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID of the network to search for

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address of the token to search for

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID of the network to search for

get.summary: Returns aggregators supported by the API (can be controled via disableAggregators param)
Returns chain USD volume and total transactions

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID of the network to search for

get.summary: Best route from a token to another

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID of the network to execute the transaction on

parameters.name: fromAddress
parameters.description: Ethereum address of the wallet to send the transaction from

parameters.name: routingStrategy
parameters.description: Routing strategy to use

parameters.name: toEoa
parameters.description: Flag that indicates if gained tokenOut should be sent to EOA

parameters.name: receiver
parameters.description: Ethereum address of the receiver of the tokenOut

parameters.name: spender
parameters.description: Ethereum address of the spender of the tokenIn

parameters.name: amountIn
parameters.description: Amount of tokenIn to swap in wei

parameters.name: amountOut
parameters.description: Amount of tokenOut to receive

parameters.name: minAmountOut
parameters.description: Minimum amount out in wei. If specified, slippage should not be specified

parameters.name: slippage
parameters.description: Slippage in basis points (1/10000). If specified, minAmountOut should not be specified

parameters.name: fee
parameters.description: Fee in basis points (1/10000) for each amountIn value. Must be in range 0-100. If specified, this percentage of each amountIn value will be sent to feeReceiver

parameters.name: feeReceiver
parameters.description: The Ethereum address that will receive the collected fee. Required if fee is provided

parameters.name: disableRFQs
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to exclude RFQ sources from routes

parameters.name: ignoreAggregators
parameters.description: A list of swap aggregators to be ignored from consideration

parameters.name: ignoreStandards
parameters.description: A list of standards to be ignored from consideration

parameters.name: tokenIn
parameters.description: Ethereum address of the token to swap from. For ETH, use 0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

parameters.name: tokenOut
parameters.description: Ethereum address of the token to swap to. For ETH, use 0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

post.summary: Best route from a token to another

get.summary: Returns transaction that approves your EnsoWallet to spend tokens

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID of the network to execute the transaction on

parameters.name: fromAddress
parameters.description: Ethereum address of the wallet to send the transaction from

parameters.name: routingStrategy
parameters.description: Routing strategy to use

parameters.name: tokenAddress
parameters.description: ERC20 token address of the token to approve

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Amount of tokens to approve in wei

get.summary: Returns all balances for a given wallet

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID of the network to execute the transaction on

parameters.name: eoaAddress
parameters.description: Address of the eoa with which to associate the ensoWallet for balances

parameters.name: useEoa
parameters.description: If true returns balances for the provided eoaAddress, instead of the associated ensoWallet

parameters.name: protocolSlug
parameters.description: Protocol slug of defi token

parameters.name: underlyingTokens
parameters.description: Underlying tokens of defi token

parameters.name: primaryAddress
parameters.description: Ethereum addresses for contract interaction of defi tokens

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Ethereum addresses of the tokens

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID of the network of the token

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Type of token.
      If not provided, both types will be taken into account

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination page number. Pages are of length 1000

parameters.name: includeMetadata
parameters.description: Whether to include token metadata (symbol, name and logos)

get.summary: Returns actions available to use in bundle shortcuts
Returns standards and methods available to use in bundle shortcuts

parameters.name: chainId

parameters.name: fromAddress

parameters.name: routingStrategy
parameters.description: Routing strategy to use (router cannot be used here)

parameters.name: receiver
parameters.description: Ethereum address of the receiver of the tokenOut

parameters.name: spender
parameters.description: Ethereum address of the spender of the tokenIn

parameters.name: tokenIn

parameters.description: Ethereum address of the token to swap from. For ETH, use 0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

parameters.name: amountIn

parameters.name: fee
parameters.description: Fee in basis points (1/10000) for each amountIn value. Must be in range 0-100. If specified, this percentage of each amountIn value will be sent to feeReceiver

parameters.name: disableRFQs
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to exclude RFQ sources from routes

parameters.name: ignoreAggregators
parameters.description: A list of swap aggregators to be ignored from consideration

get.summary: Returns projects and relevant protocols available to use in bundle shortcuts

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: slug of the project to search for

info.description:
#### Enso API
- Find detailed documentation on [docs.enso.finance](https://docs.enso.finance).
- To use the API, **you must include your API Key in the Authorization header** (Bearer format).
- For testing, Swagger pre-authorizes you using the key: `1e02632d-6feb-4a75-a157-documentation` (1rps).
- Get your own API Key at [enso.finance/developers](https://enso.finance/developers).

priceImpact.description: Price impact in basis points, null if USD price not found

feeAmount.description: An array of the fee amount collected for each tokenIn

createdAt.description: Block number the transaction was created on

tx.description: The tx object to use in `ethers`

route.description: The route the shortcut will use

chainId.description: Chain ID of the network to execute the transaction on

fromAddress.description: Ethereum address of the wallet to send the transaction from

toEoa.description: Flag that indicates if gained tokenOut should be sent to EOA

receiver.description: Ethereum address of the receiver of the tokenOut

spender.description: Ethereum address of the spender of the tokenIn

amountIn.description: Amount of tokenIn to swap in wei

minAmountOut.description: Minimum amount out in wei. If specified, slippage should not be specified

slippage.description: Slippage in basis points (1/10000). If specified, minAmountOut should not be specified

fee.description: Fee in basis points (1/10000) for each amountIn value. Must be in range 0-100. If specified, this percentage of each amountIn value will be sent to feeReceiver

feeReceiver.description: The Ethereum address that will receive the collected fee. Required if fee is provided

disableRFQs.description: A flag indicating whether to exclude RFQ sources from routes

ignoreAggregators.description: A list of swap aggregators to be ignored from consideration

ignoreStandards.description: A list of standards to be ignored from consideration

tokenIn.description: Ethereum address of the token to swap from. For ETH, use 0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

tokenOut.description: Ethereum address of the token to swap to. For ETH, use 0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

tx.description: The tx object to use in `ethers`

gas.description: The gas estimate for the transaction

amount.description: The amount of tokens to approve
The unformatted balance of the token

decimals.description: The unformatted balance of the token

price.description: Price of the token in usd

chainId.description: Chain ID of the network of the token

logosUri.description: A list of logos for the token

chainId.description: Chain ID of the network of the token

logosUri.description: A list of logos for the token

primaryAddress.description: Ethereum address for contract interaction of defi token

createdAt.description: Block number the transaction was created on

tx.description: The tx object to use in `ethers`

priceImpact.description: Price impact in basis points, null if USD price not found

feeAmount.description: An array of the fee amount collected for each tokenIn

amountIn.description: Amount of tokenIn to swap in wei

path.description: Ordered array of steps to build

chainId.description: Chain ID of the network to execute the transaction on

fromAddress.description: Ethereum address of the wallet to send the transaction from

route.description: Ordered array of paths that you want to simulate

fee.description: Fee in basis points (1/10000) for each route. If specified, this percentage of each amountIn value will be sent to feeReceiver

feeReceiver.description: The Ethereum address that will receive the collected fee. Required if fee is provided

disableRFQs.description: A flag indicating whether to exclude RFQ sources from routes

ignoreAggregators.description: A list of swap aggregators to be ignored from consideration

isRouter.description: Flag that indicates whether to use the shared router

tokenIn.description: Address of the tokenIn. For ETH, use 0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

percentageForTokenB.description: Percentage of tokenB to buy in basis points (1/10000)

slippage.description: Slippage in basis points (1/10000). Default is 300

simulate.description: Flag that indicates whether to simulate the transaction, verify some assertions, return simulationURL and events

createdAt.description: Block number the transaction was created on

tx.description: The tx object to use in `ethers`
